attributes.action: Involve and advertise Fitness specialists/professionals more in the 'Health sector'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fitness professionals are massively undervalued. Unlike doctors and GP's who are there to mainly CURE an ailment, we as health/fitness specialists are able to not only rehabilitate/cure but also prevent illness and injury and maintain all aspects of physical and mental well-being. We should be more accessible to everyone and more recognised as speicialists alongside GP's, doctors, physiotherapists and more.
